SELECT IFNULL(C.SL_CODE,'') AS slCode ,IFNULL(A.PRODUCER_EP_ID,'') AS producerEpId ,A.AUTH_TERM_BEGIN AS authTermBeginString ,IFNULL(C.SL_CODE_MANUFACTURE, '') AS slCodeManufacture ,IFNULL(B.LIC_ADDR,'') AS licAddr ,A.AUTH_TERM_END AS authTermEndString ,IFNULL(B.EP_NAME,'') AS epName ,IFNULL( CONCAT( C.PROVINCE_NAME,' ', C.CITY_NAME,' ', C.DISTRICT_NAME ), '' ) AS slAreaCode FROM SL_EP_OEM_AUTH A INNER JOIN SL_ENTERPRISE B ON (A.PRODUCER_EP_ID = B.EP_ID) INNER JOIN SL_SELLER C ON (A.PRODUCER_EP_ID=C.EP_ID) WHERE A.SL_CODE = #{filterMap.slCode} AND A.DEL_FLG = 0 AND B.DEL_FLG = 0 AND C.DEL_FLG = 0 ORDER BY A.PRODUCER_EP_ID
LIMIT #{startPos},#{pageSize};

select COUNT(1) from SL_EP_OEM_AUTH AS A INNER JOIN SL_ENTERPRISE B ON (A.PRODUCER_EP_ID = B.EP_ID) INNER JOIN SL_SELLER C ON (A.PRODUCER_EP_ID=C.EP_ID) WHERE A.SL_CODE = #{filterMap.slCode} AND A.DEL_FLG = 0 AND B.DEL_FLG = 0 AND C.DEL_FLG = 0
